tier.tier-desc: An excoriation is a layer of stone and metal that is abraded and scored, and then laid down on the floor of the lair.
An excoriation is a layer of stone and metal that is abraded and scored, and then laid down on the floor of the lair.

Imbued Bars are made from Bronze Bars that are "imbued" with essence, Dim Essence Orbs in this case. Imbued Bars are used as a structural piece in lairs, to firm up the floors and ceilings. And are often one of the more common units.

Imbued Bars are made from Iron Bars that are "imbued" with essence, Pale Essence Orbs in this case. Imbued Bars are used as a structural piece in lairs, to firm up the floors and ceilings. And are often one of the more common units.

A stone imbued with the energy of essence. It is primarily used to reinforce the walls of lairs and is a common unit in construction.

A Cast Stone is a shaped block of stone, much like a keystone, but its strength is enhanced through the application of essence.

A matrix of azulyte crystal and tri-cut gems, Crystalline Lattices are used as much for decoration as for reinforcing the structural components applied to the walls of the lairs.

Made from a Cast Stone and a metal bar, Flowstones are heavily reinforced blocks that are used as anchor points in the lair to support heavy weights. They are then placed near junctions and walls to strengthen the structural integrity of the lair.

A lodestone consists of raw stone surrounded by shaped metal. It forms a strengthened unit that can then be combined into a more complex and resilient form.

Made from a Lodestone and further imbued by magical essence, Maelstones are a strong construction unit often used to reinforce machines, lava flows, storage units, and other special structures within lairs.
